reviewText: You will notice during the show there will some music playing in the background but no singing. In the Jap version they had original music by artists that contributed in the show, but in the english it was mute but only the music went on. The Theme songs are still the same dumb english version when the jap version changes theme intro and song. This version is also has alot of bad dubbing. The only english versions worth watching was episodes 1-12.
This video is awesome!  I love the part were Ken uses his flaming dragon punch. This video also shows how powerful Ken really is. I hope they produce more episodes of Street Fighter.
